metadata.title: CVE-2017-17535 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: lib/gui.py in Bob Hepple gjots2 2.4.1 does not validate strings beforelaunching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, whichmight allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via acrafted URL.

criterions.comment: gjots2 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
